Detailed Description

Stored all the options related to search. This item should not be changed during search.

Definition at line 164 of file solver.h.

Member Data Documentation

long long SearchOptions::sollimit

Gives the solutions which should be found. -1 denotes finding all solutions.

Referenced by findAllSolutions().

bool SearchOptions::fullpropagate

Denotes if non-incremental propagation should be used. Only for debugging.

bool SearchOptions::nocheck

Denotes if solutions should be checked it they satisfy constraints. Only for debugging.

Denotes if solutions should be printed. Initialised to true.

bool SearchOptions::randomise_valvarorder

Denotes if the variable and value orderings should be randomised. Initialised to false.
